title: NFL Schedule Reactions
description:
Nora, Steven, and Ben discuss the winners and losers of the NFL schedule release, and potential pivot points in the season. They also give out some schedule superlatives.

Hosts: Nora Princiotti, Steven Ruiz, and Ben Solak
Associate Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
